ol.li: SHALL conform to Level Two Conformance template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.20)
SHALL conform to CDA Clinical Document
SHALL conform to Level One Conformance template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.10)
SHALL conform to Level Two Conformance template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.20)
[CDA] Contains [1..1] id, where its data type is II
[CDA] Contains [1..1] code, where its data type is CE
[CDA] Contains [1..1] effectiveTime, where its data type is TS
[CDA] Contains [1..1] confidentialityCode, where its data type is CE
[CDA] Contains [1..*] author, where its type is CDA Author
[CDA] Contains [1..1] custodian, where its type is CDA Custodian
[CDA] Contains [1..1] component, where its type is CDA Component2

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.10" assigningAuthorityName="CDT Level One Conformance"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.20" assigningAuthorityName="CDT Level Two Conformance"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.30" assigningAuthorityName="CDT Level Three Conformance"/> </ClinicalDocument>
